response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This exceptional item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today.

To make this offer even more appealing, I am proposing a special deal tailored just for you. For a limited time, you have the chance to purchase this remarkable product at a significantly discounted price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving of $300,000 compared to its true value, making it an incredibly attractive proposition.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you decide to proceed, I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
